document_data.name: Apsel
document_data.mainbody: '''Apsel the Scrimshander''' was a scrimshawer in [[Easthaven]] within the [[Ten Towns]] of [[Icewind Dale]].
document_data.Description: The older man dressed in dull grey clothing.
document_data.Possessions: The scrimshawer carved items from [[scrimshaw]] including fine [[dagger]]s. He often used [[Trout|knucklehead trout]] skulls for his goods.
document_data.History:
In [[Mirtul]], [[1281 DR]], [[Apsel's workshop]] was ransacked by a ravenous [[wolf]].

The same month, Apsel tried to warn the towners about the [[goblin]]s he had seen to the south from Easthaven.
